original: Lundblad, Gunnar Hagbert Leopold, lektor, Skövde, f. 24/6/91 i Stenbro-hult, Kronob. 1., av Herman L. o. Na~ taha Timielin. G. 1. 25-27 m. Ebba Hedgren; 2. 37 m. Carin Bernhult. Barn: Erik f. 25, ’Stud. v. KTH, Hans Hagbert 38, Jan Gunnar 42. — Stud:ex. i Malmö 11, fil. kand. d Lund 15, fil mag. 17, fil. lic. 21, disp. 22, prom. fil. dr 24, provår 22. E. lär. v. Malmö h. a. 1. 17-18, vik. lektor li Luleå 19-20, vik. adj. v. Gbgs h. latin 21, i Kristianstad 21-22 o. 23, lektor v. Luleå h. a. 1. 23, i biol. m. hälsolära o. kemi v. Skövde h. a. 1. sed. 29. Skolöverst\’r. ombud v. dim:ex. v. Bodens komm. gymn. 27, v. realex. i Kiruna 28, exam. v. pniv. stud :ex. i Gbg36, tjg. chef f. gasskydds-tj. inom civ. luftsk. Skr.: Över upp k. av meiomeri hos vissa apetala växter (21), über die baumechanischen Vor gänge bei der Ents’tehung von Anomomerie bei homochlamydeischen Blüten ’sowie damit zusammenh, Fra-gen (grad:avh. 22). RNO.
translated:
Lundblad, Gunnar Hagbert Leopold, lecturer, Skövde, b. 24/6/91 in Stenbro-hult, Kronob. 1st child of Herman L. and Na~ taha Timielin. Married 1st in 1925-1927 to Ebba Hedgren; 2nd in 1937 to Carin Bernhult. Children: Erik b. 1925, student at KTH, Hans Hagbert b. 1938, Jan Gunnar b. 1942. 

Education: Graduated from Malmö in 1911, Bachelor of Arts in Lund in 1915, Master of Arts in 1917, Licentiate of Philosophy in 1921, Dissertation in 1922, Ph.D. in Philosophy in 1924, probationary year in 1922. 

Teaching career: Assistant teacher at Malmö in 1917-1918, substitute lecturer in Luleå 1919-1920, substitute teacher at Gothenburg Latin school in 1921, in Kristianstad in 1921-1922 and 1923, lecturer at Luleå in 1923, in Biology and Health Science at Skövde from 1929. School inspector representative at Boden's municipal gymnasium in 1927, at Kiruna's realskola in 1928, examination at the University of Gothenburg in 1936, served as the chief of gas protection services in civil aviation. Writings: On the upper chamber of periomeri in certain apetalous plants (1921), on the biomechanical processes in the development of anomomeri in homochlamydeous flowers and related issues (dissertation, 1922). Recipient of the Royal Order of Nobility.

Über die baumechanischen Vorgänge bei der Entstehung von Anomomerie bei homochlamydeischen Blüten sowie damit zusammenhängende Fragen
